trans-unit.source: Provides the context of a call to a custom smart tag recognizer.
trans-unit.target: 向自定义智能标记识别器提供调用上下文。

trans-unit.source: When you implement the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ISmartTagExtension.Recognize%2A> method to define a custom smart tag recognizer, the `context` parameter is a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.SmartTagRecognizeContext> object.
trans-unit.target: 当实现<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ISmartTagExtension.Recognize%2A>方法用来定义自定义的智能标记识别器`context`参数是<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.SmartTagRecognizeContext>对象。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.SmartTagRecognizeContext.CellText%2A> property of this object to get the text from the cell that is sent to the recognizer, and use the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.SmartTagRecognizeContext.PersistTag%2A> method of this object to indicate that a smart tag was found.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.SmartTagRecognizeContext.CellText%2A>要获取的文本，从单元格发送到识别器，并使用此对象属性<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.SmartTagRecognizeContext.PersistTag%2A>的此对象以指示已找到的智能标记的方法。

trans-unit.source: Usage
trans-unit.target: 用法

trans-unit.source: This type is intended to be used only in projects for Excel 2007.
trans-unit.target: 此类型旨在用于 Excel 2007 仅在项目中。

trans-unit.source: Smart tags are deprecated in Excel 2010..
trans-unit.target: Excel 2010 中已弃用智能标记。

trans-unit.source: Gets the text from the cell that is sent to the <see cref="M:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ISmartTagExtension.Recognize(System.String,Microsoft.Office.Interop.SmartTag.ISmartTagRecognizerSite,Microsoft.Office.Interop.SmartTag.ISmartTagTokenList,Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.SmartTagRecognizeContext)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 获取发送给 <see cref="M:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ISmartTagExtension.Recognize(System.String,Microsoft.Office.Interop.SmartTag.ISmartTagRecognizerSite,Microsoft.Office.Interop.SmartTag.ISmartTagTokenList,Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.SmartTagRecognizeContext)" /> 方法的单元格中的文本。

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[vsto_smart_tags](~/includes/vsto-smart-tags-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[vsto_smart_tags](~/includes/vsto-smart-tags-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[vsto_smart_tags](~/includes/vsto-smart-tags-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[vsto_smart_tags](~/includes/vsto-smart-tags-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: The text from the cell that is sent to the <see cref="M:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ISmartTagExtension.Recognize(System.String,Microsoft.Office.Interop.SmartTag.ISmartTagRecognizerSite,Microsoft.Office.Interop.SmartTag.ISmartTagTokenList,Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.SmartTagRecognizeContext)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 发送到的单元格中的文本<see cref="M:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ISmartTagExtension.Recognize(System.String,Microsoft.Office.Interop.SmartTag.ISmartTagRecognizerSite,Microsoft.Office.Interop.SmartTag.ISmartTagTokenList,Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.SmartTagRecognizeContext)" />方法。

trans-unit.source: A property bag containing key and value pairs for the token.
trans-unit.target: 包含令牌的密钥和值对的属性包。

trans-unit.source: Can be <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 可以为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Stores information about the smart tag.
trans-unit.target: 存储有关智能标记的信息。

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[vsto_smart_tags](~/includes/vsto-smart-tags-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[vsto_smart_tags](~/includes/vsto-smart-tags-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: Call <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.SmartTagRecognizeContext.PersistTag%2A> from an implementation of the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ISmartTagExtension.Recognize%2A> method to indicate that the smart tag was found in the text.
trans-unit.target: 调用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.SmartTagRecognizeContext.PersistTag%2A>的实现从<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ISmartTagExtension.Recognize%2A>方法，以指示的智能标记文本中找到。

trans-unit.source: Use the `propertyBag` parameter to commit any custom properties for the smart tag.
trans-unit.target: 使用`propertyBag`参数来提交的智能标记的任何自定义属性。

trans-unit.source: You can use these properties to customize the action taken when an item from the smart tag shortcut menu is selected.
trans-unit.target: 这些属性可用于自定义时选择从智能标记快捷菜单项执行的操作。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to call <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.SmartTagRecognizeContext.PersistTag%2A> from an implementation of the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ISmartTagExtension.Recognize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何调用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.SmartTagRecognizeContext.PersistTag%2A>的实现从<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ISmartTagExtension.Recognize%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: This implementation compares each smart tag term to the contents of the cell.
trans-unit.target: 此实现将每个智能标记术语与单元格的内容进行比较。

trans-unit.source: For each smart tag term in the cell, the code adds a custom smart tag property and then uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.SmartTagRecognizeContext.PersistTag%2A> method to recognize the smart tag.
trans-unit.target: 对于每个单元中的智能标记术语，代码将添加一个自定义的智能标记属性，然后使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.SmartTagRecognizeContext.PersistTag%2A>方法以识别的智能标记。

trans-unit.source: This example assumes that you have added a reference to **Microsoft.Office.Interop.SmartTag** from the **.NET** tab of the **Add Reference** dialog box.
trans-unit.target: 此示例假定你已添加到的引用**Microsoft.Office.Interop.SmartTag**从**.NET**选项卡**添加引用**对话框。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ISmartTagExtension> interface.
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ISmartTagExtension>接口。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="M:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.SmartTagRecognizeContext.PersistTag(Microsoft.Office.Interop.SmartTag.ISmartTagProperties)" /> was not called from the <see cref="M:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ISmartTagExtension.Recognize(System.String,Microsoft.Office.Interop.SmartTag.ISmartTagRecognizerSite,Microsoft.Office.Interop.SmartTag.ISmartTagTokenList,Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.SmartTagRecognizeContext)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 未使用 <see cref="M:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.ISmartTagExtension.Recognize(System.String,Microsoft.Office.Interop.SmartTag.ISmartTagRecognizerSite,Microsoft.Office.Interop.SmartTag.ISmartTagTokenList,Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.SmartTagRecognizeContext)" /> 方法调用 <see cref="M:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Excel.SmartTagRecognizeContext.PersistTag(Microsoft.Office.Interop.SmartTag.ISmartTagProperties)" />。
